comments.body:
Should we show the example of doing the reindex before the concat as well?

```
pd.concat([df1, df4.reindex(df1.index)], axis=1).reindex(df1.index)
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +199,203 @@.. ipython:: python

   result = pd.concat([df1, df4], axis=1).reindex(df1.index)

Similarly, we could index before the concatenation:
